name: Pipe of Insight
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

descriptions.name: Barrier
descriptions.description: Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.Radius: 900

descriptions.name: Insight Aura
descriptions.description: Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.Radius: 900
